name: Albert R. KNIGHTEN, Jr., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Superintendent Martin Dragovich, Record Supervisor, Jan Shingara, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Knighten v. Commonwealth Department of Corrections

parties: Albert R. KNIGHTEN, Jr., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Superintendent Martin Dragovich, Record Supervisor, Jan Shingara, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 8th day of November, 2002, the above captioned appeal is quashed for failure to file a brief.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
812 A.2d 478
Albert R. KNIGHTEN, Jr., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Superintendent Martin Dragovich, Record Supervisor, Jan Shingara, Appellees.
No. 72 MAP 2002.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 8, 2002.
